settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Choose the provider you want to use to generate quizzes and set up your API key.
settings.description-one: Select the provider you want to use to generate quizzes.
settings.description-two: Enter your API key to be able to use the services of the model you selected.

modal.title: Welcome to AI Quiz Generator!
modal.freeUseInfo: You can use the application for free to generate up to 5 quizzes.
modal.apiKeyRequirement: After reaching this limit, you will need to set up your own Google or OpenAI API key to continue using the application.
modal.apiKeySetupInfo: You can configure your API key at any time by clicking the settings icon ⚙️ in the top bar.

mainContent.headline: Generate smart quizzes with AI in seconds
mainContent.description: Upload your PDF or image and let AI create a personalized quiz for you. Perfect for all students who want to study more efficiently.
mainContent.limit: You have reached the limit of free quizzes. To continue, add your API key.

description.image: Drag and drop your image here, or click to select.
description.pdf: Drag and drop your PDF file here, or click to select.

QuizConfig.title: Quiz Configuration
QuizConfig.description: Customize your quiz according to your needs
QuizConfig.topicsQuestion: What topics do you want the questions to be generated about?
QuizConfig.topicsPlaceholder: Write what topics you want the questions to be generated based on the provided content

intelligentQuestions.title: Intelligent question generation
intelligentQuestions.description: Our AI creates unique questions based on the provided content

adaptability.title: Difficulty level adaptability
adaptability.description: Questions automatically adjust according to the selected level

personalizedApproach.title: Personalized approach
personalizedApproach.description: Generates specific questions according to the chosen focus

preview.title: Quiz preview:
preview.summary: Based on this configuration, the AI will generate a personalized quiz with medium-level questions focused on general topics.

QuizIntro.title: Knowledge Quiz
QuizIntro.description: Get ready, in this Quiz you'll validate your knowledge
features: You can take the quiz as many times as you want.
There's no time limit to complete it, no stress.
At the end, you'll know which knowledge you need to reinforce to master it.

QuizResults.title: Results
QuizResults.description: Here you can see your answers and quiz results.

questions.use: What is one of the main uses of the simple present tense?
questions.example: Which sentence is an example of the simple present tense?
questions.truth: Which sentence uses the simple present tense to state a general truth?

answers.earth: The Earth revolves around the Sun

actions.why: Why is this the wrong answer?
